characters.Entities.abilities

Interface IAbility<THost extends Entity,TTarget extends Entity>

  • Type Parameters:
    THost -
    TTarget -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbilityBase, AttackPlayerAbility, GhostModeAbility, GlobalSlowDownAbility, HigherSystemDamageAbility, InactiveAbility, MarkInfiltratorAbility, ReinforcedSystemsAbility, SlowDownTargetAbility, SpeedingUpAbility, StopTargetAbility

    public interface IAbility<THost extends Entity,TTarget extends Entity>
    the ability can be host by player and enemy

    • Method Summary

      void endUseAbility()
      end to use ability when ability useTiming is form n to 0;you can remove the ability effect here.
